name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SERP Analyzer Pro | Google, YouTube & TikTok SERP Analysis

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: SERP Analyzer Pro | Google, YouTube & TikTok SERP Analysis

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
SERP Analyzer Pro, your go-to tool for seamless SERP analysis on Google, TikTok and YouTube Search. This tool simplifies your search engine results pages by concisely displaying essential information and highlighting key data points, making it a must-have for search marketers - SEO, PPC specialists, and content creators.

Key Features of SERP Analyzer Pro

On SERP
1. Rank Tags - Instantly view the SERP rankings for each result, clearly presented for quick identification.

Power Bar 
1. Instant Load - Instantly load all search results with just one click.
2. Open N - Open multiple results with a single click, streamlining your workflow.  
3. Download results - Easily download the results, including rank, domain, and URLs.
4. Copy URLs - Copy all result URLs with one click.

Exploration Panel
1. Domain Overview - Quickly view all ranking domains, including their ranks and site logos, for a visual summary of SERP landscape.
2. SERP Search - Filter and search results based on rank or domain name.
3. Easy Access - Open any result in a new tab directly from the exploration panel.

Settings
1. Rank Tag Switch - Choose to show or hide rank tags according to your preference.
2. Open N Options - Customise the number of links you can open with a single click, (choose from 3, 5, or 10).

SERP Analyzer Pro is designed to empower search marketers to navigate and analyze SERPs more effectively and efficiently. Upgrade your browsing experience and take your SERP research to the next level with SERP Analyzer Pro, available now on the Chrome Store.
